name: android-manifest-package-name
description: Change the package name on your android manifest file at build time.
author: James Montemagno

inputs.name: sourcePath
inputs.label: Android Manifest File Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Full path to android manifest file.

inputs.name: packageName
inputs.label: Package Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: New name to set for the package name in the manifest.

inputs.name: appLabel
inputs.label: Application Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: New name to set for the appliation label in the manifest (leave blank to use existing value in AndroidManifest.xml).

inputs.name: printFile
inputs.label: Print File
inputs.helpMarkDown: If you would like to print the file contents before and after changing variables.
